name: Bladeforce
description:
How to Play

You must use the “WASD“ keys to walk.

You have to press “J“  to hit the enemies.

You need to press the “Space” key to make the character jump. You decide how much your character needs to jump.

Game Story

In ancient times there was an independent village. Their people lived happily in their villages. They also had old samurai masters to protect in a possible attack. One day a king wanted to take over this place, and he got what he wanted, and he cast a spell on all the people. They who were enchanted have now turned into people who served the King. But some people could not cast this spell, and most of them were a few of the noble warriors who guarded the village. The Bewitched populace led the warriors to the king-owned prison. Among the former Warriors taken to prison is Samurai master Blade. He escaped from the prison and went to the castle to save the king from this spell he had cast on humans. After clearing the soldiers at the entrance to the castle, he fought and defeated the dragon that guarded the King's chamber. Blade, who came to the King's room, fought with the king after clearing the soldiers here. After defeating the king as well, he broke the spell on the people and allowed they to return to their homeland.

Game Concept

Concept of the game is 2D Platformer game. The duty of this game is killing enemies and he escapes from the dungeon. After that, he finds the castle owned by the king and enters here. It is a dragon that protects the king who meets him before the King. Facing the king after crossing the Dragon, Blade leaves, freeing the village and people owned by the King.

Visual of Game

The game has 4 levels. 

1.Escape from the stage Dungeon. 

2.The entrance to the tier Castle. 

3.The door guarded by the stage Dragon. 

4.The End Of The Stage King.

Download and play the game so that you can experience these described in the game.

Thanks in advance.
